servers.description: The base URL for Teams API

get.description: Retrieves the first 50 members for the specified team.

name.description: The full name of the team member.

given_name.description: The first name (given name) of the team member. Returns empty string if not available.

family_name.description: The last name (family name) of the team member. Returns empty string if not available.

nickname.description: The nickname of the team member. Returns empty string if not available.

email.description: The email of the team member.

role.description: The team-level role of the team member.

post.description: Creates a new team member invitation for the specified team.

tenant_roles.description: Roles assigned to the invitee on tenants

id.description: The unique identifier for the created invitation

tenant_roles.description: Roles assigned to the invitee on tenants

post.summary: Create a tenant under the current team
post.description: This endpoint creates a new tenant under your team. Upon successful creation, the response includes the tenant's details along with the management client credentials that can be used to configure and manage the tenant.

get.summary: Get tenants for the current team
get.description: Retrieves the first 50 tenants for the specified team. If private cloud support beta is enabled for the team, both public and private tenants are returned; otherwise, only public tenants are returned.

tenant_id.description: The unique identifier for this tenant

tenant_fqdn.description: The fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the tenant, which uniquely identifies its domain within the system. The FQDN is used to define the audience when interacting with the Management API, enabling programmatic management of the tenant’s configuration and resources.

get.summary: Retrieve environment list of a team
get.description: Returns the list of environments associated with the team.

environments.description: List of environments. For Public cloud → hostEnvironment value. For Private cloud → space.name value

get.summary: Retrieve details for a specific tenant
get.description: This endpoint retrieves the details of a single tenant.

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the tenant to retrieve.

tenant_id.description: The unique ID of the tenant.

tenant_fqdn.description: The fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the tenant.

environment.description: The name of the cloud environment where the tenant was created.

region.description: Region in which the tenant was created.

created_at.description: The date and time when the tenant was created.

delete.summary: Delete a tenant from the current team
delete.description: Delete a tenant from the current team

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: The id of the tenant to delete

get.summary: Retrieve a list of tenant members
get.description: This endpoint retrieves first 50 members for a specific tenant.

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the tenant.

id.description: The unique ID of the tenant member (Auth0 user ID).

name.description: The full name of the member. Returns empty string if not available.

roles.description: An array of roles assigned to the member.

given_name.description: The first name (given name) of the member. Returns empty string if not available.

family_name.description: The last name (family name) of the member. Returns empty string if not available.

nickname.description: The nickname of the member. Returns empty string if not available.

get.summary: Retrieve detailed information for a specific team member
get.description: This endpoint retrieves the details of a single team member, including their basic profile information and team-level role.

parameters.name: team_member_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the team member to retrieve (Auth0 user ID, e.g., auth0|68da0038bab277c02ed1d4c8).

id.description: The unique ID of the team member (Auth0 user ID).

name.description: The full name of the team member.

given_name.description: The first name (given name) of the team member. Returns empty string if not available.

family_name.description: The last name (family name) of the team member. Returns empty string if not available.

nickname.description: The nickname of the team member. Returns empty string if not available.

email.description: The email of the team member.

role.description: The team-level role of the team member.

delete.description: This endpoint deletes a team member from the team.

parameters.name: team_member_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the team member to delete (Auth0 user ID, e.g., auth0|68da0038bab277c02ed1d4c8).

patch.description: This endpoint performs a partial update to a team member's information, specifically to change their team role.

parameters.name: team_member_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the team member to update (Auth0 user ID, e.g., auth0|68da0038bab277c02ed1d4c8).

role.description: The new role to assign to the team member.

id.description: The unique ID of the team member (Auth0 user ID).

email.description: The email of the team member.

role.description: The team-level role of the team member.

name.description: The full name of the team member.

given_name.description: The first name (given name) of the team member. Returns empty string if not available.

family_name.description: The last name (family name) of the team member. Returns empty string if not available.

nickname.description: The nickname of the team member. Returns empty string if not available.

get.summary: List a member's tenant access within an environment
get.description: Returns all tenants (within the specified environment) the team member has access to, including roles per tenant.

parameters.name: team_member_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the team member (Auth0 user ID, e.g., auth0|68da0038bab277c02ed1d4c8).

tenants.description: List of tenants the member has access to within this environment.

tenant_id.description: The unique identifier of the tenant.

tenant_fqdn.description: The fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the tenant.

roles.description: An array of roles assigned to the team member within the tenant.

role.description: The role assigned to the member.

clientIds.description: The list of apps the user has access to for the 'editor-specific-apps' role. This property is only present for this role.

TenantName.description: The tenant name uniquely identifies a tenant programmatically and within various dashboards, such as Auth0 Dashboard. It can only contain alphanumeric characters, lowercase letters and "-". However, it can't start nor end with "-". If not specified, a tenant name will be auto-generated.

EnvironmentType.description:
Specifies the Environment type for the tenant created in the Auth0 Public Cloud. It is used to distinguish between development, staging and production environments.
Development and Staging environments are intended for testing and pre-production use, while production is designated for live applications and subject to hiher rate limits. Selecting the correct environment type ensures appropriate resource allocation and rate limits.

AdminEmail.description: The email of the person that will be added as an admin of the tenant. The person must be a member of the team.

PublicCloudRegion.description:
Specifies the Auth0 Public Cloud region where the tenant will be created.
Available regions include United States (us), Europe (eu), Australia (au), Japan (jp), Canada (ca) and United Kingdom (uk).

PrivateCloudEnvironment.description: Specifies the name of the Auth0 Private Cloud environment where the tenant will be created.

errorMessage.oneOf: must have a matching schema between 'Public Cloud' or 'Private Cloud'

AdminEmail.description: The email of the person that will be added as an admin of the tenant. The person must be a member of the team.

ManagementClient.description: The Auth0 Management Client credentials required to authenticate and interact with the newly created tenant. These credentials allow authorized access to manage the tenant's configuration, resources, and API interactions.

client_name.description: The name of the Machine to Machine client, which is used for secure, automated interactions with the tenant's APIs and services.

client_id.description: The id of the Machine to Machine client, which is used for secure, automated interactions with the tenant's APIs and services.

client_secret.description: The client secret the Machine to Machine client, which is used for secure, automated interactions with the tenant's APIs and services.

tenant_id.description: The unique identifier of the created tenant (UUID). This identifier is required for performing operations such as deleting the tenant. UUIDs ensure global uniqueness and are essential for managing tenant resources programmatically

tenant_fqdn.description: The fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the tenant, which uniquely identifies its domain within the system. The FQDN is used to define the audience when interacting with the Management API, enabling programmatic management of the tenant’s configuration and resources.

region.description: Region in which the tenant was created.

environment.description: The name of the cloud environment where the tenant was created

created_at.description: The date and time when the tenant was created, formatted in ISO 8601 standard. This timestamp ensures consistency across time zones and systems.

ManagementClient.description: The Auth0 Management Client credentials required to authenticate and interact with the newly created tenant. These credentials allow authorized access to manage the tenant's configuration, resources, and API interactions.

client_name.description: The name of the Machine to Machine client, which is used for secure, automated interactions with the tenant's APIs and services.

client_id.description: The id of the Machine to Machine client, which is used for secure, automated interactions with the tenant's APIs and services.

client_secret.description: The client secret the Machine to Machine client, which is used for secure, automated interactions with the tenant's APIs and services.

id.description: The unique ID of the tenant member (Auth0 user ID).

name.description: The full name of the member. Returns empty string if not available.

roles.description: An array of roles assigned to the member.

given_name.description: The first name (given name) of the member. Returns empty string if not available.

family_name.description: The last name (family name) of the member. Returns empty string if not available.

nickname.description: The nickname of the member. Returns empty string if not available.

UnauthorizedResponse.description: Token has expired or signature is invalid.

ForbiddenResponse.description: Forbidden. The message will vary depending on the cause.

examples.title: You have reached the limit for tenants in your current plan

NotFoundResponse.description: Not Found. The message will vary depending on the cause.

TooManyRequestsResponse.description: Too Many Requests. The message will vary depending on the cause.

InternalServerErrorResponse.description: Internal Server Error. The server encountered an unexpected condition and could not fulfill the request.

ConflictResponse.description: Conflict. The message will vary depending on the cause.

examples.title: A tenant with the same name already exists
